name: Solid Gold
overview: Compilation of games previously released individually in Europe by U.S. Gold Featuring: - Gauntlet (conversion of the arcade classic) - Ace of Aces (flight combat simulator, originally published in North America by Accolade - Leaderboard (Golf game originally released in North America by Access Software) - Winter Games (Sports game originally released in North America by Epyx) - Infiltrator (a combination of a flight simulator and ground missions that involve stealth, originally released in North America by Mindscape)
